original_title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat ng Damortis
overview: The Kingdom of Damortis was once ruled by the kind-hearted Empress Sofia (Maricel Laxa), whose death was ordered by Basilicus (Mark Gil), her brother, who greatly desires the throne. Princess Dahlia (Anne Curtis), heir to the throne, elopes with blind singer Mico (Ticson Uy). Amain (Jun Urbano) and his warrior trainees Jobert (Jason Salcedo), Samuel (Junell Hernando), and Oman (Janus del Prado), are tasked to protect the princess and save Damortis from the evil forces of Basilicus.
title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat ng Damortis
